Package io.github.jonestimd.swing.component

Class FilterField<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.text.JTextComponent
            • javax.swing.JEditorPane
              • javax.swing.JTextPane
                • io.github.jonestimd.swing.component.FilterField<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the parameter type of the parsed predicate
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterSource, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
    public class FilterField<T>
extends javax.swing.JTextPane
implements FilterSource
    A text pane that allows the user to enter a filter expression. When the text changes it is parsed by a FilterParser. When the text is successfully parsed a property change event is fired for the parsed predicate. When parsing fails the fields background color is changed to the specified errorBackground. Operators are typed using the Ctrl key and are displayed with a bold font. When the caret is at a parenthesis the matching parenthesis is highlighted. This component supports the following operators.
    • grouping: ()
    • not: !
    • and: &
    • or: | (displayed as │)

    This component can be used with a BeanModelRowSorter to filter the rows displayed in a table.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
